_metadata.title: Anti-Phishing Policy - Strict
_metadata.description: Deploys a strict anti-phishing policy with aggressive thresholds, mailbox intelligence, spoof intelligence, organization domain protection, and targeted user protection. All impersonation detections are routed to quarantine.
_metadata.requiredLicence: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 Plan 1 or Plan 2
_metadata._notes: Requires Defender for Office 365 P1/P2. Deploy the policy first (step 1), then assign to recipients via the rule (step 2). TargetedUserProtection is disabled by default â€” enable post-deployment and add high-value targets (C-suite, finance, HR). Review quarantine for false positives during the first 7 days.

parameters.Name: Strict Anti-Phish Policy
parameters._postDeploymentNote_TargetedUsers: Enable TargetedUserProtection and add C-suite/high-value UPNs post-deployment: Set-AntiPhishPolicy -Identity 'Strict Anti-Phish Policy' -EnableTargetedUserProtection $true -TargetedUsersToProtect @('ceo@domain.com;CEO','cfo@domain.com;CFO')

postDeployment: Get-AntiPhishRule -Identity 'Strict Anti-Phish Rule - All Recipients' | Format-List

Enable TargetedUserProtection and add C-suite UPNs: Set-AntiPhishPolicy -Identity 'Strict Anti-Phish Policy' -EnableTargetedUserProtection $true -TargetedUsersToProtect @('ceo@domain.com;CEO','cfo@domain.com;CFO')
Monitor quarantine for false positives during first 7 days of deployment
